length.description:
Suggest the length of the body. Use the items in the enum.
Too Long: The description is too long for its provided intent.
Long: The Description is a bit longer than how much long an issue should be (recommended size: 200words max)
Good: The description is perfect for its intent

tone.description: Describes the tone of the body

summary.description: Provide a summary in nicely formatted markdown (set it only if the length is set to "Too Long" or "Long" or else let it be an empty string)
